name: Horizon (itch) (Plundration)
description:
Horizon is my very first game. It's a spaceship shooter game with simulated n-body gravity in which you have to avoid bullets from enemy ships, not crash into planets, and collect strange matter to get home through a black hole, that would normally kill you. 

Controls:

W - accelerate

A,S - rotate

Esc - pause

Space - shoot

M - zoom out
